output.sentences: This guy was so happy Kim posed for a picture with him.
Kim spent a lot of time with her fans today and made this girls day as she sat playing the keyboard with her.
Kim's band members talked to each other more than they talked to their fans.
Not only are Kim and her band talented musicians, they are also very good speakers.
At the end of the meeting Kim made sure to get photos with all of the people.
